details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.9 Embedded files - Subtype
details.description: The embedded file stream dictionary shall include a valid MIME type value for the Subtype key. If the MIME type is not known, the value "application/octet-stream" shall be used.

rule.description: The embedded file stream dictionary shall include a valid MIME type value for the Subtype key. If the MIME type is not known, the value "application/octet-stream" shall be used.

error.message: MIME type %1 of an embedded file is missing or invalid
